RelatedSentence: Sure , it 's possible that the state will modify , delay , or even rescind some of the increases , but do n't bet on it .
The fees have n't been raised since 2009 , and the increases are expected to generate between $ 55 million and $ 63 million in fiscal 2015 , money that MassDOT is already counting on .
